name: Ayenda Ltd.
description: Operator of a hotel accommodation platform intended to offer standardized rooms at low prices. The company's platform offers a network of hotel rooms at prices falling under a reasonable budget segment which can be booked through a platform along with services like free WiFi and clean sheets, enabling customers to access quality amenities and experiences while traveling.
one_liner: Operator of a hotel accommodation platform intended to offer standardized rooms at low prices. The company's platform offers a network of hotel rooms at prices falling under a reasonable budget segment which can be booked through a platform along with services like free WiFi and clean sheets, enabling customers to access quality amenities and experiences while traveling.
